diff_act: 2.prioritize them according to the stride-scheduling algorithm

regen.absent_element: handling of job completion or failure
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall handle job completion by removing it from the queue and handle job failure by restarting or notifying the administrator according to a predefined policy.

regen.absent_element: handle job dependency and potential job failure during execution
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall handle job dependencies and failures by re-evaluating job priorities and adjusting the execution schedule accordingly.

regen.absent_element: handling of job completion or termination
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall handle job completion or termination by removing the completed job from the queue and updating the system state accordingly.

label: In case of a tie, the arbitrary FIFO job ordering is used.
absence: situation of multiple minimum pass values(tie)
